TableView.name: VIEW_SMP9_PMM
TableView.afterCreate:
CREATE OR REPLACE FORCE VIEW "EASYVIEW"."VIEW_SMP9_PMM" ("DATA", "REGIONAL", "SMP9", "SMP_A", "SMP_B") AS
WITH regionais AS
(SELECT REGIONAL.NOME AS regional, regional.* FROM REGIONAL WHERE indicador_smp = 'T'
),
dias AS
(SELECT TRUNC(SYSDATE) data FROM dual
UNION ALL
SELECT TRUNC(SYSDATE - Level) FROM dual CONNECT BY Level < 15
),
regionais_x_dias_x_pmms AS
(SELECT * FROM regionais r, dias d
),
dados_traducao_sem_vinculo as
(select DATA, CENTRAL, CN, PMM, REGIONAL, UF, SMP9_A, SMP9_B from view_msc_vinculo_smp9 where codigo != 'NID'
),
dados_x_pmm AS
(SELECT TRUNC(Tab.DATA) AS Data,
Reg.NOME AS regional,
NVL(TO_CHAR(SUM(NVL(SMP9_A, 0))), '0') AS SMP9_A,
NVL(TO_CHAR(SUM(NVL(SMP9_B, 0))), '0') AS SMP9_B
FROM
view_msc_cn_ativo_smp9 b,
dados_traducao_sem_vinculo Tab
INNER JOIN Cn Cn
ON Cn.Nome = Tab.CN
INNER JOIN Metricview.Rel_Regional_Cod_Nacional Reg_Cod
ON Reg_Cod.Id_Cn = Cn.Id_Cn
INNER JOIN regionais Reg
ON Reg_Cod.Id_Regional = Reg.ID_REGIONAL AND Reg.indicador_smp = 'T',
dias dias
WHERE TRUNC(dias.data) = TRUNC(Tab.DATA)
and tab.central = b.msc
and tab.cn = b.cn
and to_date(to_char(tab.data,'MM/yyyy'),'MM/yyyy') = b.periodo
and b.status = 'T'
GROUP BY TRUNC(Tab.DATA),
Reg.NOME
),
dados_finais AS
(SELECT reg.data,
reg.regional,
CASE
WHEN dados.SMP9_B = '0'
AND dados.SMP9_A != '0'
AND to_number(dados.SMP9_A) >= 0
THEN '0,00'
WHEN dados.SMP9_B = '0'
AND dados.SMP9_A != '0'
THEN '0,00'
WHEN dados.SMP9_A = '0'
AND dados.SMP9_B != '0'
THEN '0,00'
ELSE NVL(trim(TO_CHAR(ROUND(((SMP9_A / SMP9_B) * 100),2),'999990D99')), '0,00')
END AS SMP9,
nvl(smp9_a,'0') smp9_a,
nvl(smp9_b,'0') smp9_b
FROM dados_x_pmm dados,
regionais_x_dias_x_pmms reg
WHERE reg.data = dados.Data(+)
AND reg.regional = dados.regional(+)
)
SELECT dados_finais.data,
dados_finais.regional,
CASE
WHEN dados_finais.SMP9 != '0,00'
AND to_number(dados_finais.SMP9) > 100
THEN '100,00'
ELSE replace(dados_finais.SMP9,'.',',')
END AS SMP9,
smp9_a smp_a,
smp9_b smp_b
FROM dados_finais
ORDER BY 1,
2,
3
TableView.layoutSQL: Select * From dual
